attributes.action: apply the re-claiming of excessive Bank charges to the business world.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is currently available to personal bank account holders only and can be back dated for 6 years from its inception last year.Many small businesses struggle to gain a positive cash flow especially when starting up and for example,to be charged £33 per cheque for exceeding an overdraft facility is totally and utterly excessive.Many small businesses need constructive help from their bank  and for these financial institutions to incur a variety of such surcharges is totally and utterly obscene and needs to be addressed now.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
